summary: This bill, the Federal Overhaul of Reserve Command Executive Modernization Act (FORCE Act), establishes a National Defense Executive Reserve. The Reserve would allow the President to activate private sector experts for temporary roles within federal agencies during national defense emergencies. It outlines the establishment of Reserve units within specific agencies, training protocols, activation procedures, and employment protections for Reserve members. The bill also amends the Defense Production Act of 1950, modifying aspects related to voluntary agreements designed as a response to catastrophic cyberattacks on critical infrastructure or alternative issues pertinent to national defense.
